title: Green Beans Indian Style
instructions: Wash and trim the green beans then cut them crosswise in small pieces.  In a heavy skillet, heat the clarified butter over high heat until its very hot and sauté the mustard seed for 30 seconds.  Stir in the green beans and the onion, together.  Add the salt, ground ginger, and the cayenne pepper, stirring constantly for 5 minutes.  Reduce the heat to low, stir in the ground coriander and cook the mixture covered for another 8 to 10 minutes, or until the beans are tender.  Lastly, toss the green beans with 3 to 4 tablespoons of lemon juice and serve them immediately.
Source:  Les Primeurs, Gourmet Magazine, May 1973.
